reviews.review_text: I was searching for the best burger in town and stumble upon juicy joe s on Google map, a 4.9 star rated take out burger place with hundreds of reviews, too good to be true right? No, they totally lived up to their reviews, from the service all the way to the food they are in every way the best in town. I ve got the truffle mushroom burger recommend by the staff with a half poutine, the burger is rich and flavourful, everything works really well together. Poutine is beautifully done, and their gravy is exceptionally rich. You just have to try it to believe it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Celeste, trust us we arent out here trying to catfish anyone with our 4.9 stars! That is just the result of hard work, a stellar team and dang good food. In all seriousness, thank you for your support and for taking the time to leave such a kind review. Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Juicy Joes serves great burgers, its specialty. The beef burgers are grass finished, and 2 smashed patties are on each burger. Currently Joes serves take-out only so drop by at the Ommeleterie restaurant,  at 6th and Granville, where they serve out of kitchen, order, and the burgers are done in 10 minutes...so quick! Bon appetit!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Janet, good food and even better customer service is our specialty! We are so happy to hear you liked the food and cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Probably one of the better if not best smash burgers in vanc. I had the truffle Swiss burger and the bacon cheeseburger and both were delicious. The truffle Swiss mushroom burger was my favourite and personally I really loved white spot Monty mushroom burger but this brings it to another level. Wouldn t hesitate to late night snack again. Disclaimer.. atmosphere was my car haha so there s no dine in. But I gave it a 5 since I knew about that coming in.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Felix, we are so happy to welcome you to the world of next-level smash burgers! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: WOWOWOW. Best smash burgers in town!! The seasoning, the crisp, the flavor- delicious. A little expensive but you get what you pay for!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Nathan, we are all about top quality, amazing food and even better customer service. Thanks for supporting our burger dreams

reviews.review_text: Long story short: definitely give this place a try. Place has 4.9 for a reason! It was a cold dark rainy night (seriously, sept 24, 8pm, it was raining). My partner and I were standing outside the omelettery, puzzled by the burger sign, as we tried to open up the qr code menu on our phones. The owner, Sina, flung open the front door and welcomed us to look at the menu inside. He then took us on a journey on how his burger ingredients were sourced, prepared and served. All of which, was brimming with excitement and passion. You could really tell Sina was really proud of what he and his team were slinging. His pitch made us forget we were walking over from having dessert. We had to try one, even though we were full. We got the juicy original burger, and we enjoyed it next to our car, under the lights of a carpet store. So I cant say for sure how well it holds up for delivery or long transport. The beef: smash-seared perfectly. Not too thin that you get jerky. Smashed enough so you get a crisp meaty crust but the center is still juicy. The bun: airy, light, not soggy or falling aparty. The caramelized onions: slowly cooked to a perfect unrushed jammy perfection. Will definitely be back to try the other more hefty burgers!

*Inside Paul s Omelettery* This smashburger is absolutely insane - 10/10 and even better that it s Grass Fed, Grass Finished, and never frozen so the flavor is incredible. We re visiting from SF on our way to Whistler and saw the high rating on Google. The people there could not be more lovely and I can t recommend enough. I got the lettuce wrapped cheeseburger with carmelized onions (carmelized for 12-24 hours) with bacon and it was perfection. They re open from 5pm-1am and it s pick-up or delivery only. We will be returning on our way back from Whistler!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Caitlin, we have been called the burger speak easy because we have a ghost kitchen inside another restaurant. You have the team blushing with such a kind review. We cant wait to feed you on your way back from Whistler

reviews.review_text: Very high chance this place has the best burger in Vancouver bacon cheeseburger was extremely flavourful only downside is that it s takeout only. My understanding is that they will open a sit-down in the near future. A must try!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tomas, we are just out here smashing burgers and your expectations! In all seriousness, your support means the world to us. Its true! We have been dreaming of a sit down location for quite some time now so, who knows what will happen.

reviews.review_text: The reviews dont lie. Run, dont walk to grab yourself a burger! Service was exceptional. The three of us got a free cookie each! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Krystyn, we are so happy to hear that we have another happy Juicy Joes Family member! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: We were a bit sceptical thinking  there s no way this place is actually a 5 star and all the reviews were good   but let me tell you  the way I folded for these burgers oh my god. It was genuinely the best I ve ever had and I ve had my fair share of burgers across the country. We re traveling from out of province and looking for something to eat. I have to say one of the best foods I ve had throughout our entire trip to Vancouver. The buns were so soft and the patty tasted extremely delicious and slightly crispy which was perfect. The flavours were incredible. I got the Pineapple Express burger and my friend got the regular cheese burger and both were crazy good. I was tempted to buy another. Enough that we went back and tried their poutine. I really liked it. I love how they added onions to top it off. The gravy flavour is great. I would definitely get their burgers again if we ever come back to Vancouver. Also thanks for the free cookies    Hopefully one day they come have a restaurant in our city
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Allam, we are so happy that you enjoyed your food enough to visit us again in the same trip! We appreciate your kind review more than you know, even if you were skeptical at first   All that is left to say is welcome to the Juicy Joes family! We cant wait to feed you on your next trip to YVR

reviews.review_text: Hands down the best burger Ive had in Vancouver. Perfect smash with the crispy lacy edges. Also like the poutine, delivered with the gravy separate so you can have some squeaky curds. I usually avoid virtual/ghost kitchens but I am very glad I tried this place. Also, its operating out of a real restaurant after hours so I like that it helps that business too. We gotta get the word out so they can open their own shop!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Shane, we are so happy you took a chance on us! Its support like yours that lets us live our burger dreams. Welcome to the Juicy Joes Family

reviews.review_text: The burger at this Vancouver spot was a true delight! Impeccably crafted with flavors that left me craving more. A definite must-try for burger aficionados!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Sanaz, we appreciate your feedback more than you know! Cant wait to feed you again soon.

reviews.review_text: My favourite burger in Vancouver! Its only pick up and delivery, but the service pops out consistent top quality burgers every time! Plus its open until 1am, great for a late night craving. The Juicy Original (Tip: add Bacon and ketchup) its amazing! I usually order delivery, but the one time I came in for a pickup, a young worker opened the door for me and was super nice! He said the burgers are made with love. Cant recommend this hidden gem enough!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jamison, we are so glad youre part of the Juicy Joes Fam, and we dont lie when we say the secret ingredient to our smash burgers is love. Your support really does mean the world to us

reviews.review_text: Well deserved rating! We ordered the Pineapple Express Burger, Truffle Mushroom and Swiss Burger, and Truffle fries. The burgers were loaded and flavourful. The fries were amazing too! Keep in mind that they only have delivery/pick-up as they are currently renting the kitchen from Pauls Omelettery. We didnt know that but the staff still kindly let us in
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey, thanks for the kind review! We always love when you guys order the full spread to try all our flavour combinations. We hope to see you again for takeout soon and thanks for being understanding about our no dine-in

reviews.review_text: This burger shop is the real deal! Such a hidden gem. The guy who ordered in front of me said he couldn t stop thinking about this burger for the last 5 days and had to return. After eating mine, I feel the same way. The burger did not disappoint! Generous quantity of food, great flavours, and they sweetened the deal with free aioli and cookies. The staff were very friendly and appreciative. Will be back very soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, dont feel bad - daydreaming about smash burgers is TOTALLY normal around here    But really, thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review; it really does mean the world to our team. And welcome to the Juicy Joes family!

reviews.review_text: OMG I LOVE JUICY JOE!! I got the truffle burger and it was sooooo gooood! We also got the truffle fries  so amazing and crispy and perfect with the truffle burger
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey, awwwe we love you too! Thanks for taking the time to leave such a kind review and welcome to the Juicy Joes family!

reviews.review_text: Legitimately the one of the best burgers in Vancouver - hands down. Strongly recommend the blue cheese/mushroom burger with the addition of crispy onions.  Perfectly cooked smash patties, great blue cheese compound mixture with just the right bun to protein mixture. Every time I visit from Seattle I make sure I order this at least once during my trip - its become a tradition almost and truly one of the most delicious burgers Ive had this side of the border.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Michael, crossing the border for our burgers is a whole new level of dedication and we appreciate your support! We cant wait to feed you again soon on your next Canadian adventure

reviews.review_text: The Best Burger Ive ever had !! And Im old lol , cooked to perfection, garnished perfectly, with many different types of burgers to pick from, and wrapped perfectly with a very fresh bun. Juicy but not greasy, and beats out A$W, Wendys, etc, by far!! My absolute favorite place with warm, friendly, kind staff who work very hard to provide your perfect burger experience !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ellie, we will take best burger youve ever had as a HUGE compliment, especially with your year of burger experience. In all seriousness, your review means the world to our whole team. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: What kind of burger place gets almost a 5  rating ?! Juicy Joes does. Ghost kitchen operating at night, take out or delivery only. If youre ordering in person, it feels a bit like youre at a burger speakeasy. I had the pineapple express. A generous amount of delicious beef meat with a bit of rib eye in there, whiskey BBQ sauce, pineapple, tomato, crispy onion bits... Finger-licking good. The picture doesnt do justice to it. Know that the burgers do not come with fries, but I was clearly there for the burgs and honestly it felt like a satisfying meal in itself. Staff was awesome, passionned about their burgers, talking about them. The hype was real and I wasnt disappointed. Got a glass of water and sat until my burger was ready, got a free cookie as it was my 1st time. Seriously go try their burgers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Valentin, welcome to the Juicy Joes family and we are so happy you enjoyed your burger! And we hope you dont mind if we start referring to ourselves as a burger speakeasy that is just to good

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers ever in Vancouver. The juicy burgers toped with caramelized onion are amazing. I always go for original cheeseburger and truffle mushroom burger which I can t find the same anywhere else. Great customer service as well. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Arash, good food and even better service is what Juicy Joes is all about. Reading such a kind review means the world to the whole team. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Juicy Joes was absolutely amazing! Service was exceptional, staff were kind and thoughtful and you can see how that reflects in the burgers. Starting with the packaging, box container to prevent smushing and foil to retain heat. Bun was buttery and fragrant but not overly sweet. The cheese was still melted and needed no reheating. My usual gripe with smash patties is that I seem to get less meat than I would a usual burger, not so with Joes.  The patties were stacked high and each one was super crispy. I will be back soon enough!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adrian, welcome to the Juicy Joes family! It sounds like you are a well-researched smash burger eater, which we love around here   Your kind review means the world to our whole team!

reviews.review_text: Was looking to get some late night burgers! Im happy to have found this gem! Owner and cooks were super friendly and the food was yummy!  Will come back to try the other burgers
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Valerie, we are basically late-night burger scholars!  Thanks for the kind review, it means more to us than you know

reviews.review_text: ABSOLUTELY DIVINE!! This was the best burger I ve ever had. Classic cheeseburger is a MUST; it was our top choice! Second best choice is pineapple express (kind of obvious, but thats only if you like pineapples in food). On top of the amazing food, the staff was super nice and friendly! Love this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Arya, we really appreciate you taking the time to write us such a kind review, and we cant wait to feed you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely the BEST smashburgers. I usually get the Pineapple Express and Parmesan Truffle Fries and both are amazing! Always fresh ground, never frozen, locally sourced beef.  Tonight I tried the Truffle mushroom Swiss burger and it is definitely a new favourite. Anything weve tried from here has been delicious and highly satisfying. Tonight we went to go pick up our order and I am so glad we did. Something you dont get with using a meal delivery service is the great customer service from the staff and owner. Do not hesitate, try Juicy Joes Burgers! Take-out/pick-up only. Vegetarian options: Vegan Chxn Burger and Impossible Burger.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jen, you have the entire team blushing with this review thats for sure! It means the world to us that you enjoyed your adventurous menu pick and took the time to leave such a kind review. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: The BEST burger I have ever had in my life, hands down. The owner is so welcoming and hospitable. I saw him insist that delivery drivers bring their bags to the door so that the food stays hot for delivery. These people know what s up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anna, we wear the best burger of your life with so much pride you will never know what that means to our whole team! And yes, chef doesnt mess around when it comes to good food and even better customer service. We cant wait to feed you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Who the hell gave this place less than 5 starts? Did they just order napkins or something. Never had a more pleasurable food experience in my LIFE.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yousef, dang! You have the whole team blushing with this review. We honestly cant tell you how much your burger excitement and support means to us! Cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: We ended up going there because of the Google review and it was surprisingly amazing! The owner and staff were very friendly. And the food was definitively perfect! It is very hard to find a good burger in Vancouver but this one it top of my list now! My little son ate all his burger and a bunch of fries and was taproom that was nhummy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bruna, we are so happy the whole family loved our burgers! Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers I have ever had! The owner Sin was so lovely. Proud and happy to support local business  that make amazing food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Tammy, your support means more than you know to chef and the who team! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic! The burgers (and fries!) are to die for - fresh, flavorful, and satisfying, with local ingredients. Everyone working there is super friendly too - I called in a takeout order last night and it was going to be ready before I could get there, so they delayed it for me so it would be fresher without any problem. It is takeout only (operating from the omelleterie, which closes before they open), so I recommend people plan on eating in the park nearby or driving it right home. The food keeps in the takeout bag reasonably well (fries still crispy, burger hot and juicy with no runoff) but like any food the faster you can eat it after cooking the better it tastes! Ive been mentioning to people that I have a new secret burger place and then showing them it on the map. Its a good conversation starter, though the 500 reviews here seem to point to my secret getting out...
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Tom, our team works really hard to make sure that each order is made to order and steaming hot when it gets into your hands (and your belly). We SO appreciate your kind review and dont worry we will always treat our Juicy Joes Family as just that no matter how many reviews we gain.

reviews.review_text: The most exquisite burgers in Vancouver. I ve never had burgers that are so fresh and juicy. It brings me great joy to to taste such a yummy burger.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michelle, burger joy is our specialty! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: We had a bacon cheeseburger and a truffle mushroom burger, both were excellent! Probably the best smash burger we have had in a while. I think it s a fair price for the quality of the ingredients. Plus, the service was fantastic and professional. Would really recommend this restaurant!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Morgana, we are so happy to hear that your burgers we delicious! Your support means the world to the whole team and we cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: I came here just the other day an hour before closing with a few buddy s of mine not expecting much about 1 am burgers but I must say, it was the best burger I had in ages. I got the number 1 (bacon cheeseburger?) Along with Joe being super friendly. Definitely will be coming back for more burgers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jayden, exceeding your late-night burger expectations has us giddy over here. Chef really doesnt mess around with serving up the BEST burgers, no matter how late it is. We cant wait to feed you and your crew again soon

reviews.review_text: Damn good burger. I highly recommend their bacon cheese burger with crispy onions added.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, we would have to agree with you but we might be a little bit bias. In all seriousness, thank you for taking the time to leave such kind words about our food - it means the world to our team

reviews.review_text: Went for the 2nd time tonight. We eat a burger every friday and try all the places in the downtown area and further out sometimes. Depending on what were doing. For straight up burgers this place is legit. Either my number 1 or tied for first. Thanks.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Ryan, we do not take that compliment lightly from a dedicated burger connoisseur like yourself. All thats left to say is thank you for your support and welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Probably the citys best kept secret... for now. The burger was fresh AF and when I picked up our burgers we felt like we were part of a community. Easily one of the best burgers Ive ever had. Ps. They gave us cookies while we waited. Who does that?!?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, were pretty pumped to have you as part of our Juicy Joes family, so the better question is, why not celebrate with cookies? In all seriousness, thanks for taking the time to write us a review!

reviews.review_text: The Best Burger in Vancouver. Fresh and juicy beef patties, melted cheese, caramelized onions and very soft bun. Simple  and delicious! Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Carolina, wow! We really like that title   In all seriousness, thank you for your support - it means the world to us.

reviews.review_text: I recently visited Juicy Joes for a burger. At the time, Juicy Joes held the highest rating among burger joints in town. I opted for their Blue Cheese and Mushroom burger, accompanied by a small poutine on the side. The burger was delicious and  so satisfying that I didnt even need the poutine. I can see why Juicy Joes has earned its exceptional reputation. NB: at the moment you can eat in as there currently sharing premises with another restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Neil, you have us blushing over here with such kind words! We appreciate this more than you know. Quick note: we *cant* accept dine-in at this time because while we are set up as a ghost kitchen in another restaurant, we dont use the rest of the space for our Juicy Joes Family, but we cant wait to feed you again soon.

reviews.review_text: This place has exceptional customer service and burgers. The owner went above and beyond to satisfy our burger craving. I got the vegan choice and it was just as good as a real burger. My partner got the classic and said it was the best burger in town
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Grace, at this point satisfying a burger craving is basically chefs super power! In all seriousness, thanks for taking the time to give us a shout out

reviews.review_text: This place was amazing!! My boyfriend and I stopped by to grab a burger but we were shocked by how friendly, welcoming, and attentive the service was. Not sure what his name was but the gentlemen that greeted us and took our order was exceptional. The food was also delicious! We got 3 burgers, large truffle fries, and cookies and everything was amazing! Will definitely be returning.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lauren, we really dont joke around about good food and even better customer service! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Best juiciest burger around,  great staff, bun are amazing,  yummy caramelized onions...good job
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Afif, chef takes our motto good food and even better service pretty darn seriously. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your food, and welcome to the Juicy Joes family!

reviews.review_text: Take-out only burger joint! We had the spicy chicken burger and one of the hamburgers. I highly recommend the beef burgers as it seems to be their specialty! The owner was sweet and very personable. They put a lot of love and care into each of the ingredients. Hoping to try their pineapple express burger next time. We ended up taking our food to South Granville Plaza by 13th avenue where there is nice outdoor seating.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daisy, we are so happy to hear that our burgers made a good edition to your picnic in the Plaza! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: My bf and I were travelling back home and had a long layover in YVR so we decided to rent a car and look for food,  it was a bit hard as it was around 12 am on a Sunday so most of the places were closed already. While searching, we found this place on google and had really great reviews so we decided to give it a try! We couldn t find it at first but after driving around where it was supposed to be, we found it. They only do take out as they don t have their own place yet. The customer service was amazing, the owner was there and he chatted with us while we were waiting for our food and gave us great recommendations. All the food on the menu was carefully thought out and some of the ingredients were highly sourced out as well. The workers there had really great knowledge of the menu as well and recommended us on what their favourite things were on the menu and I m so glad we listened to them. We ordered the yam fries and they were really good, the house mayo was the best as it was super creamy! For our mains we ordered the truffle mushroom burger and the mushroom blue and I only have great things to say, the mushroom blue is by far the BEST burger I ve ever had and the truffle burger comes second! We also ordered cookies and they gave it to us on the house and that was a really nice touch! If you ever come to Vancouver, you guys need to try this place out, you won t regret it! We will definitely come back when we re in van city and hopefully they have their own restaurant by then! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Mik, we appreciate any adventure that ends with burgers! In all seriousness, we are so happy you found us and hopefully, next time you are in town we have dine-in available.

reviews.review_text: First of all, best smash burgers in Vancouver hands down. We came back after first trying their original smash burger and loving it  somehow the truffle one is even better. 10/10 MUST TRY. Now that the foods out the way, just wanted to thank the staff for the absolute BEST treatment I ve ever had eating out. We felt like we were being smothered with love, almost like we ve known them for ages. All the staff from reception, to the chef, to the manager/owner, the hospitality and service was incredible. An absolute must try from start to finish. Honestly surprised it s not more popular than it is.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Omar, we take care of our Juicy Joes family, thats for sure! And that definitely means top-notch food and smothering you in love. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: The food was AMAZING . but the staff were just as amazing. So kind, helpful and inviting. Visiting the area from ON, Canada but will definitely stop in to get a Juicy Bacon Cheeseburger from Juicy Joes again. All the food was so fresh. 10/10 burger place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Abi, we hope our smash burgers made your trip across the country worth it! And welcome to the Juicy Joes Family where the burgers are mouth watering and the service is exceptional

reviews.review_text: Hands down the best burger in town! Definition of feel good food! Ill finish work at 10pm and still drive for 20+ min (over 2 bridges) to wrap my day up with a burger from Juicy Joes! Do yourself a favour, check this place out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shayan, we appreciate the dedication! Your support really does mean the world to our whole team

reviews.review_text: Best burger Ive had! Service is amazing! You can tell that they are using the best ingredients possible. Flavorfull meat and extremely soft bun.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marc, thank you for the shoutout. It really does mean the world to us when our Juicy Joes family takes the time to taste the difference our quality makes!

reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying, I am a burger connoisseur. Iv tried it all, iv been here twice now. And I must say this is no ordinary burger place  that patty is out of this world, with the combined sauces and ingredients, it is the most savoury, flavourful, heavenly burger you will ever eat. Out of all places I travelled so far and wide who claim the  best tasting status . This definitely deserves the best burgers ever title.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Paul, we are big burger connoisseurs ourselves but hearing this from you has us blushing! Chef and our team work really hard for out of this world flavour, quality and customer service so, your shout out means the world to us. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Wow. That was a fantastic burger! So, so good. Smashed with bacon and cheese, and a delicious sauce, and a perfect bun. But thats not where it ends, because the fries step up and demonstrate that they are not here to play 2nd fiddle to those burgers. Crispy on the outside but still a nice interior consistency. With a light seasoning they have a lovely flavour on their own, but when combined with the roasted garlic dip? Amazing. Its a little bit hard to find, until you realize it is actually run out of the same location as the Omelettery. This is a great small business. They are open late, have super friendly staff, and great food! Whats not to love? (No photos, I didnt want to waste a second by grabbing my phone instead of the food.)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey, now this review has the whole team blushing! We are so glad you found us, and we wanted to say a big welcome to the Juicy Joes family!

reviews.review_text: The best take out burger in the city. Beautifully caramelized beefiness - hot and fresh.  Called in for pick up and everything was ready go and perfectly done. Always service with a smile. Love this place
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lee, not to get mushy or anything but we love you and the rest of our Juicy Joes Family too    We really do appreciate your kind words buddy!

reviews.review_text: Great burger joint with fantastic, juicy, smashed burgers and crispy fries. Ill be coming back here often. I got the bacon-cheeseburger but now Ill be working through all the burgers they got. Id recommend calling and ordering direct if youre doing pick-up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mattisse, we can appreciate your ambition to work through the menu - we promise it wont disappoint. Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: This place deserve even more than 5/5. Burgers are absolutely amazing, delicious and fresh. If you like smashed burgers you should definitely try this place. The owner and their staff just make the experience 10x better and it is amazing that they can connect with their customers so well although they are just take out resturant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Elnaz, if you want to chat with Google about a 10-star review, we wouldnt complain   In all seriousness, we appreciate your support and cant wait to feed you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I ordered the juicy original added an extra Patty , I honestly think it s better than between two buns and burger crush, and that s saying a lot. I was very satisfied. Definitely needed that extra Patty.  My new favourite burger in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Zach, cheers to new favourites! We love hearing that you enjoyed your food and feel free to toss on an extra patty or make any other customizations you want. We cant wait to feed you again soon.

reviews.review_text: We ordered truffle mushroom burger, spicy chicken burger, and truffle fries. Needless to say, all the food was PERFECT! The burger was literally juicy and fries were the best fries Ive ever had in Vancouver   And also the message on the box also made me very happy! Thank you guys
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gianna, we are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your food! We hope to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Best smash burger in Vancouver! The meat was so juicy and the bun was so light, chefs kiss! Also the owner was just lovely, so great to all the delivery drivers. 10/10!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Diana, we really arent lying when we say best smash burger in Van but hearing it from you makes it so much sweeter! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Fantastic experience trying out Juicy Joe s for the first time tonight with my girlfriend. 11/10 customer service! The owner explained all the menu items to us, was very passionate about the food, and made us feel incredibly welcome - even gave us a cookie during our wait. Not to mention the burgers were great. We will return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bryn, if you ask us no date night is complete without Juicy Joes! Our whole team including chef wanted to give you a big shout out for such a kind review. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Best burgers in the city, hands down! The quality of the burgers are unmatched and flavours are divine. I appreciate their attention to high-quality, local ingredients. 100% recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Espanda, thank you for leaving such a kind review. We work really hard to make sure that the quality and flavour of our smash burgers are unmatched. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers I ever had in Vancouver. Super tasty, the meat was so good, fresh. Definitely I ll come back here so many times. And I think it s super cute they gift you a cookie. Love the ppl there, the burger, all.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Luis, you made the teams day with your review! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Ok first of all, look at my order request, then their response! Honestly best poutine in BC and I moved from QC! Thanks guys/gals! I m having another drink for you! Xo
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lee, we dont mess around with good food, and who doesnt love a little taste of home?

reviews.review_text: Can we give this place a 10 star? Wow!!! This restaurant is a hidden gem! I am blown away by the customer service (owner is amazing), high level ingredient sourcing and simply outstanding taste. My husband and I are visiting and would love to come again because we enjoyed our meal so much. The best burger - you can t go wrong. The poutine and fries were crispy beyond measure! The cheese cake was lovely for dessert. A must try and new favourite!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrea, we dont see why not   In all seriousness, thank you for your kind review. It really does mean the world to our team. Hopefully next time you and your husband are in town, we can feed you again

reviews.review_text: Trust me when I say that I ve put away a large amount of burgers in my lifetime. Nothing is better after a long day of work or a long night of drinking like the aroma coming out of a hotbag. I ve eaten so many different burgers from so many different places, in this city and abroad. And with that experience I can honestly say this burger is MURDEROUSLY GOOD. The pattys, OMFG the damn pattys are everything you ever dreamed. Those thin,  perfectly smashed disks of heaven with that CRUST. Been dreaming about that crust for nights now. It s just good. Like stupid good. I found out about them a week ago, I ve already been 4 times. I must be stopped. But I can t because these burgers insane. Get the Bacon one it s my favorite. They re all elite though. The staff is just lovely af too. Serving hot, foil-wrapped joy to the masses, why the hell wouldn t they be? Get yourself one before they blow up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Vihor, now this review is exactly why we love our Juicy Joes Family SO much! First of all, yes to all the burger nerding that is happening here - you are speaking our language. Second, we appreciate your support more than you know, and we cant wait to feed you again (no judgment if we see you everyday)!

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers I have had. The truffle burger was full of flavour. I got the large truffle fries and enjoyed left overs the next day! Can t wait to come back soon
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Heena, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your Juicy Joes two days in a row. We cant wait for your next visit so we can feed you again

reviews.review_text: I was in Vancouver for a few days, and I had the craving for a really good burger, and what I found was an amazing burger place. Everything was so tasty and fresh, I would recommend juicy joes to anyone who spends some time in Vancouver. 5/5 for sure !!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, thanks for taking the time to leave such a kind review and welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: This is a ghost kitchen so theres no sit down option. But damn what service for a pick up restaurant. We were welcomed with such warmth and the food was hot, delish and the best burger I had in Vancouver. Dont skip trying the chicken strips, absolutely the best chicken tenders Ive ever had, juicy chicken just the right amount of crispy breading. We loved it so much we ordered from Ubereats and it was just as delish. Will not disappoint! Try them asap!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kristina, we are blushing after reading this glowing review! But for real, thank you for taking the time to write such kind things about our food and our team. Your support means the world to us

reviews.review_text: After a late delayed flight we were VERY hungry and tried some 24 hour restaurants ( but luckily they were closed?!). We ended up at Juicy Joes and had an amazing couple of blue cheese burgers with truffle mayo fries. Great people and great food! PS - sorry about the pic, realized I should take one but the food was already gone.

Best smashed burgers in vancouver! Perfect maillard reaction, crispy but juicy, flavourfull and tasty, and well seasoned! + the toppings add and extra layer, not overpowering or taking away from the flavor    super nice and friendly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kasra, the burger nerd in us got really excited to see the words maillard reaction in a review   but in all seriousness, thank you for the kind words!

reviews.review_text: This is THE BEST burger in town. Not only that, the owner provides the best service Ive ever experienced. I ordered from Uber Eats. The driver took the wrong customers order. Before I knew about this, the owner Sina, proactively contacted Uber so he could talk to me on the phone. He apologized and offered to remade my order fresh, added an extra item for free, and delivered the order to my home by himself. Ive never experienced and didnt expect this level of commitment to quality and service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chun, thank you for leaving such a kind review. Sometimes with third party delivery apps, things like this can happen. Chef is very passionate about his food and going above and beyond on the customer service side is what our team does to make sure our Juicy Joes Family is happy   We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Please read my full review because this restaurant deserves all the praise! Let me start off by saying the food is 10/10 and I have NEVER had a smash burger as tasty as Juicy Joes! I have lived in California and have been all over USA and tried several different burgers but these guys nailed the recipe. The burger and it s ingredients are completely fresh and it literally melts in your mouth when you take a bite. The onions are caramelized to perfection, the meat is exceptional quality, with a crunchy and golden brown texture, and the American cheese + bun is to die for. Literally the best Ive had in my entire life. The owner Cena is a charismatic and very passionate man whose hospitality is very welcoming. He is a very kind man who is always smiling and going above and beyond with his service. All the chefs and employees and extremely hard working with the best energy ALWAYS. Do not miss this hidden gem, it deserves all the flowers, reviews, and appreciation. I eat here a few times every week and cannot get enough! JUICY JOES FOR THE WIN
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey JT, you have no idea just how much chef and the entire team appreciate you leaving such a detailed (drool worthy) review! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family and we cannot wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: I don t know if I ve ever left a review for a restaurant on google before, but this place absolutely deserves it. This was the best service experience I ve ever had at a restaurant by far. The guy at the front was kind, funny, and had a great energy. I ordered a full poutine and a jr cheeseburger for about $28CAD, but also got a free cookie, side of fries, and orange juice. The cheeseburger is easily the most flavorful burger I ve had, especially given its simplicity. their poutine is also great. the fries were crispy and fluffy, the cheese was melty, and the gravy was warm and delicious. I can t recommend this place enough, it s worlds better than your favorite chain burger restaurant!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brandon, for a first reviewer you sure have us blushing over here. In all seriousness, thank you for your kind words about our food and service. The team works very hard and we appreciate this more than you know. The only thing left to say is welcome to the Juicy Joes family!

reviews.review_text: Without resorting to hyperbole and superlatives as customer reviews are so often wont to do, I can confidently say - without reservation - that Juicy Joe s changed my life. It wasn t like I was having a bad day when I happened to happen upon the hallowed halls of Joe s storied kitchen, I was just feeling generally kind of listless in life. Which is arguably worse. However, as I m sure you ve already guessed, my dear, hungry, hamburger loving reader, all of my malaise and ennui melted away as soon as Juicy Joe s delightfully classic cheeseburger entered my universe. The carefully selected, locally sourced ingredients, the meticulous manner in which each culinary element worked in concert to create a definitively delectable and singularly scrumptious consumption experience, and ultimately the marvellous man behind the magical sandwich all helped to remind me that there are so many things to live for. To live is to aspire to lofty goals and then pursue them with as much tenacity as kindness. With as much fierce perseverance as brotherly understanding. With all your mind and all your heart. Juicy Joe s serves up more than just tasty burgers. Juicy Joe s will reinvigorate your passion to dream, to attain, and to live. Thanks for the burger Juicy Joe s! You changed my life, and I will be forever grateful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Noam, welcome to the Juicy Joes family where life changing smash burgers and scrumptious consumption experiences are the norm. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: My grandson and I have been on a quest for the last half year for the best burger in Vancouver. We may have found it in the Juicy Bacon. The web site indicates all of the good things in it but for us, the only important thing is the taste. The meat tasted better, the bacon tasted better, the burger tasted better! My grandson is a burger connoisseur and the Juicy Bacon just had both of us smiling.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David, having your official burger connoisseur stamp of approval means the world to our whole team! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family and we cannot wait to feed you and your grandson again soon

reviews.review_text: Nice food, nice people here. Highly recommend spicy chicken burger:)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Qi, thanks for your 5-star review! Good food and even better customer service is what we are all about

reviews.review_text: It was our first time trying Juicy Joe s and they did not disappoint! The service was phenomenal, the food was absolutely amazing, and the prices were not bad considering how ~fancy~ the food was! The truffle and parm fries with the chipotle mayo is an absolute must try!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Josie, I think we will start referring to our high-quality ingredients as fancy - it has a nice ring to it! In all seriousness, thank you for your support and we cant wait to feed you some more fancy smash burgers soon

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers Ive ever had! Highly recommend. Honestly going to keep this quiet. Only the closest of friends will get to know that rich, juicy flavour
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mitch, okay shhhhh we will keep this on the down low for you too. All jokes aside, thanks for your support and we cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: The best burger in town and super friendly staffs! We also tried their delicious poutine. Due to the shortage in staff, no dine in, but there is a park  nearby. Our to go bag includes some surprise yummy handmade cookies. We will definitely go back again :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jessie, this absolutely made the teams day! Thanks for taking the time to give us a shout out, we cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: An amazing burger - filling, delicious, quality fresh ingredients shine through. What a find. Currently running out of Paul s Omelettery kitchen. It s not just another burger. Yes it s pricier but this isn t fast food. Well worth it - my new fav burger home in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Samuel, can we use that as our new slogan filling, delicious, quality fresh ingredients shine through? In all seriousness, we are thrilled you enjoyed your meal! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: We found this awesome gem tonight! Their ghost kitchen is amazing and the service provided by the owner and his staff was outstanding. Great locally sourced and handmade ingredients. The quality and care put into their product is terrific.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, chef is SO passionate about top-quality, fresh ingredients for all of our smash burgers. We appreciate the shout-out and cant wait to feed you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I luckily found this place by chance. The burger was so perfect that it left us wanting more!! The staff and owner are delightful, I will go back not only for the delicious food but also having a great conversation. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yasamin, we dont joke around about good food and even better customer service. Thanks for leaving us a review. Your support means a lot to our whole team!

reviews.review_text: How can a burger be this juicy and yummy and yet you feel so light afterwards? Thin crispy patty. Fresh ingredients. Delicious fluffy brioche bun. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Atronoush, hard to believe until you try a Juicy Joes smash burger for yourself, right?! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Easily the best burgers in town. I had basically stopped eating burgers in Vancouver as they are beyond lacklustre but these folks are on another level. Do yourself a favour and try them out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brodie, you can always find your next-level smash burgers at Juicy Joes! Thanks for the support buddy

reviews.review_text: Beautiful food, beautiful humans. My buds and i were out hitting the town, beat to an absolutely pulp. We had walked a 10k that night and been rained on for hours. These kinds souls took us in under their wings after closing hours and nourished us back to health with their scrumptious burgers and poutine. simply, this place ROCKS. GOOD FOOD. GOOD PEOPLE XOXOXO
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Luke, good food and even better service is our motto! Welcome to the Juicy Joes family - we cant wait to feed you again soon!

reviews.review_text: OMG.  Hands down the best burger Ive had so far. I ordered the mushroom burger plus a large poutine. The mushroom burger is amazingly shockingly good.  The bun is super soft, patty is juicy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wawa, we dont joke around about the Juicy in our name! In all seriousness, thank you for your kind words and we cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Hands down best burger in the city. Honestly one of the best I ve ever had. Open late and always friendly. Top late night option in Fairview
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hashim, you have the whole team blushing with this review! Thanks for the kind words, your support means more than you know

reviews.review_text: The food and the quality of the food was worth the wait. The customer service and care from the employees at Juicy Joes is outstanding. They go above and beyond to serve their customers with respect and kindness. Would definitely check this place out if you love burgers, or just love some delicious high quality food for a hangout.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jimmy, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your food and our customer service. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: BEST BURGER EVER. I wanted a burger but also wanted to try somewhere new. Saw this place on ubereats and decided to check the reviews on google because I love smash burgers. All of the reviews are accurate. Truly one of the best burgers i ve had in a long while. This will be my go to burger spot. I never leave reviews, but juicy joe s was so good that I absolutely had to. These reviews convinced me to try this place, and I m hoping mine can help with that too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Miya, welcome to the Juicy Joes Family! You have no idea how much it means to us that you took the time to give us and our burgers a shout-out. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: I don t write reviews at all. But I just received my order from Juicy Joe s. I don t know if it was the owner or the manager who called me to check on the modification of my burgers. It was very thoughtful. I have had lots of crispy chicken and other kinds of burgers in different countries and cities, but this place is definitely in my top 5 places for burger list. They also threw in an extra cookie because I was a first time customer. Amazing food and amazing customer service. What else can someone ask for. Thank you to the Juicy Joe s team for an amazing food. I hope they forever maintain this amazing quality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chef Kan, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us such a kind note more than you know. We dont take our spot in your top 5 burger list lightly    and welcome to the Juicy Joes Family!

reviews.review_text: Staff was very kind and accommodating. Service was quick and treated us to some free cookies. Rodolpho (our server) was incredibly helpful and greeted us with a nice smile. No complaints
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Sam, good food and even better service is kind of our unofficial motto around here so your review put a big smile on the entire teams face! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: I had the juicy bacon burger and it was one of the best burgers I ever had. Plus, the staff is super friendly. I asked to meet Joe, but he wasnt there apparently lol. Is there really a Joe?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Chloe, we are so happy to have made it to the top of your list with our burgers! P.S. you can call him Chef or Joe; either way you are going to get a mouth-watering burger

reviews.review_text: Best burger Ive had in all of Vancouver by a landslide, as well as service that went above and beyond.  Already making plans to go back as soon as Im able~ Dietary restrictions: The group I was with had varying dietary restrictions per person and they were super willing to accommodate for all of them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Ceili, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed the food and customer service. The only thing left to say is welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: I consider myself a burger expert, and this is hands down the best burger in Vancouver. Don t waste your time anywhere else, go to Juicy Joes!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Cam, we couldnt agree with you more! In all seriousness, thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review

reviews.review_text: Best burgers in the City!! Possibly the best burgers in the world! My husband and I decided to treat ourselves, and holy moly did we ever get treated    Burgers arrived (by Uber) and were still hot, the poutine was freaking delicious (cheesy, hot and the gravy  ) and the cheesecake was divine! We will never order our burgers from anywhere else, so happy we found Juicy Joes
****600th review*** Best burger I ve had in my life. This place is always consistent amazing job guys! Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Ronny, thank you for celebrating 600 amazing reviews from the Juicy Joes family with us Hearing that our smash burgers were the best of your life definitely puts a big grin on our entire teams faces. We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Best smash burgers in Canada. Ordered burgers for takeout and the food quality and service was exceptional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, we are thrilled to hear that our motto of good food and even better customer service was a success!

reviews.review_text: Burgers were some of the best I have ever had.  Totally cool little secret joint with friendly and wonderful customer service.  Everything was packed well for a picnic in the park.  Can t wait to go back again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anna, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your burgers! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Great Fresh Beef. Nice owner. Will come again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey, we are so happy that you will be back for more Juicy Joes! Thanks for taking the time to leave us such a kind review.

reviews.review_text: Great service, great food, great people! Absolutely amazing burgers! I tell all my friends to come here for some good smash burgers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Austyn, it looks like our mission has been accomplished. Great service, great food and great people are what were all about   Welcome to the Juicy Joes family buddy!

reviews.review_text: Ordered from Uber eats. Came hot and fresh best burger I ever had. Am now a fan.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Danielle, thank you for taking the time to leave us a shout-out! We are so happy that your food was hot and yummy. Welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Bacon cheeseburger was great. Had the Parmesan garlic fries and they were also great. Kids (who are picky AF) also liked the kids burger. Fries were good, don t bother with the chicken tenders they are nothing special. Would go again many times. Ring the doorbell on the front of the omelette store.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Chase, we are so glad you guys enjoyed your food! I guess we will have to put picky AF eater approved in our marketing.

reviews.review_text: Impressive service and even better food. Quality was impeccable, nicest burger I ve had in years. Will be back soon
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Euan, this is quite the compliment and it means the world to our whole team! We cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: Usually pick up and they sat my wife and I inside for our 10 year anniversary as it was slow. Friendly team and great burgers. Extra crispy smash. 10/10
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Paul, we were happy to be part of such a big occasion! Thank you for the kind review, and we cant wait to feed you again soon

reviews.review_text: If youre on the hunt for the best burgers in town, look no further than Juicy Joes. I recently had the pleasure of trying their smashburgers, and they were hands-down the best burgers Ive ever had. The patties were perfectly seared, juicy, and bursting with flavor. I also couldnt get enough of their crispy and savory poutine, complete with vegan gravy options that were just as delicious. The service was top-notch, and the atmosphere was casual and inviting, making it the perfect spot for a quick lunch or casual dinner. Its no surprise that Juicy Joes has a 4.9-star rating on Google - they truly deserve it. If youre a burger fan, dont miss out on Juicy Joes. Its a must-visit for anyone looking for the ultimate burger experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Saffron, we are blushing after reading this review! We appreciate it more than you know and we wanted to give you a HUGE warm welcome to the Juicy Joes family

reviews.review_text: Stopped by on my way to the ferry, from the airport. Lovely people, amazing food. Strongly recommend the parmesan and truffle fries and the smashed patty cheese burger was just epic!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Thomas, thanks for including us in your adventure! We couldnt be happier to hear you loved your food
